Class Input

  • Method Details

    • input

      public static Object input(String msg)
      It inputs data and returns in any types intelligently. It returns data as an instance of Object class. The data needs to be converted to required data type explicitly
      Parameters:
      msg - Message that is to be displayed as prompt
      Returns:
      Accepted data in instance of Object class

    • inputMultipleInt

      public static int[] inputMultipleInt(int limit, String msg)
      Inputs multiple integer data
      Parameters:
      limit - Number of set of data to be accepted
      msg - Message that is to be displayed as prompt
      Returns:
      Accepted data in form of a int array

    • inputMultipleString

      public static String[] inputMultipleString(int limit, String msg, String exitKeyword, boolean ignoreCase)
      Inputs multiple String data with an exit keyword. If the entered data is matched with exit code the loop breaks. The exit code is matched with entered data ignoring case if the ignoreCase variable has the value true
      Parameters:
      limit - Number of set of data to be accepted
      msg - Message that is to be displayed as prompt
      exitKeyword - The keyword which when matches with accepted data breaks the loop
      ignoreCase - The keyword is matched with accepted data ignoring case if the value in it is true
      Returns:
      Accepted data in form of a String array

    • inputString

      public static String inputString(String message, byte stringCase)
      Inputs string data and changes the value of the accepted data with respect to the specified case
      Parameters:
      message - Message that is to be displayed as prompt
      stringCase - The case to which the accepted data is to changed
      Returns:
      The accepetd data with respect to specified case
